verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Down in adoration falling
This great sacrament we hail
Over ancient forms departing
Newer rites of grace prevail
Faith for all defects supplying
Where the feeble senses fail

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To the everlasting Father
And the Son who reigns on high
With the spirit blest proceeding
Forth from each eternally
Be salvation honor blessing
Might and endless majesty

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus Lamb of God
Saving love for all
Lord of heaven and earth
Father's love for us
I bow to you

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Pour upon us Lord of mercy
Spirit of thy selfless love
Make us of one true heart yearning
For the glory of thy Son
Jesus Fire of justice blazing
Gladn-ing light forever more

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Tantum Ergo Sacramentum
Venerémur cérnui
Et antíquum documéntum
Novo cedat rítui
Paestet fides suppleméntum
Sénsuum de féctui

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Genitóri Genitóque
Laus et jubilatio
Salus honor, virtus quoque
Sit et benedictio
Procedénti ab utróque
Compar sit laudátio
